Title: Snotling Pump Wagons
Intro: Each model in a Snotling Pump Wagons unit is armed with Explodin’ Spores, Pokin’ Sticks and Ram Spikes.

Rules.Name: Pump Harder, Ladz
Rules.Rule: ABILITIES If you roll a double when determing this unit’s Move characteristic in your movement phase, this unit is pumped up until the end of your turn. You can re-roll charge rolls for pumped-up units, and you can add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with Ram Spikes by pumped-up units.
